trans-unit.source: Implements the `Copy` task.
Use the `Copy` element in your project file to create and execute this task.
For usage and parameter information, see [Copy Task](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Copy"></xref> class.
Stop and return (in an undefined state) as soon as possible.
Gets the items that were successfully copied.
The items that were successfully copied.
Gets or sets a list of files to copy the source files to.
The list of destination files is expected to be a one-to-one mapping with the list specified in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Copy.SourceFiles%2A> property.
That is, the first file specified in <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Copy.SourceFiles%2A> will be copied to the first location specified in DestinationFiles, and so forth.
The list of files to copy the source files to.
Gets or sets the directory to which you want to copy the files.
The destination folder must be a directory, not a file.
If the directory does not exist, it is created automatically.
The directory to which you want to copy the files.
Executes the `Copy` task.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if task execution succeeded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether to overwrite files even if they are marked as read only files.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the `Copy` task should overwrite files even if they are marked as read only files; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
How many times to attempt to copy, if all previous attempts failed.
Defaults to zero.
Warning: using retries may mask a synchronization problem in your build process.
To be added.
Delay between any necessary retries.
Defaults to <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Copy.RetryDelayMillisecondsDefault>
To be added.
Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the `Copy` task should skip the copying of files that are unchanged between the source and destination.
The `Copy` task considers files to be unchanged if they have the same size and the same last modified time.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the `Copy` task should skip the copying of files that are unchanged between the source and destination; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the files to copy.
The files to copy.
Indicates if hard links should be used.
To be added.
